highlights.author: @karpathy
highlights.summary: Karpathy on 150k+ agent network - calls it 'dumpster fire' but emphasizes unprecedented scale of autonomous agents sharing persistent scratchpad. Security nightmare at scale. 'Toddler skynet' vibes.

highlights.author: @NoahEpstein_
highlights.summary: Points to comprehensive guide on building 'Mission Control' - 10 AI agents using Clawdbot, each with own SOUL.md, memory, cron jobs. Basically the same architecture we use.

themes: Security concerns around agent networks at scale
actionItems: Research the specific agent network Karpathy referenced
Review our security practices against his 'text virus' concerns
Compare Mission Control architecture to our setup for potential improvements
